thread.section_title: We have officially found the worst team-mate of all time after the greatest own goal in history – Metro
thread.title: We have officially found the worst team-mate of all time after the greatest own goal in history
thread.title_full: We have officially found the worst team-mate of all time after the greatest own goal in history

author: Lee Thomas-Mason
title: We have officially found the worst team-mate of all time after the greatest own goal in history
text:
The moment you know you’ve made a huge mistake. (Picture: YouTube) Sometimes in football things just don’t go your way.
When you only have one win in your last 12 outings, you’re slipping perilously close towards the relegation zone and you just can’t stop conceding penalties.
Enter Turkish second division side Buyuksehir Gaziantepspor and their incredibly stupid unfortunate defender Riza Efendioglu. 
From what we can gather from the slightly hazy results, Gaziantepspor had the chance to defeat promotion hopefuls Goztepe before falling 2-1 behind courtesy of this absolute gem. This is what football is all about.
The beautiful game.
&&&&& To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video 
Should it have counted? Well, according to the rules: ‘If a goalkeeper has gained possession of the ball with his hands, he cannot be challenged by an opponent.’
So, given the fact that it was a team-mate and not and opponent, we’re guessing this one is all good.
Love it, absolutely love it.
More: Football Arsene Wenger reveals he has some advice for the FA after his Burnley meltdown 
Gary Neville lays into Anthony Martial and offers him some advice 
Arsene Wenger breaks silence following Serge Gnabry transfer rumours
